attributes.action: Keep baby & children aisles  open at stores.
attributes.additional_details: Make sure stores keep them open but like with other items, limit the amount they can buy. B&M have already closed thier ailes.
attributes.background: We need to keep baby and children ailes open in stores. These are classed as essentials, especially baby items, we need baby food, nappies, equipment and nursing essentials! You can't feed babys bread! Children need toys to keep them busy and occupied while staying at home with this lockdown.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual retailers. The advice from the Government is that any goods available in open stores can be sold.
